article: Today is November 8th. It's Gina's birthday. She is twelve.  Jim , Kate and Bill are her friends. They want to buy some presents   for Gina. They  go to the shop near the school. There are a lot of things in the shop. They buy a big cake , two boxes of color pencils , a pencil-box and some nice exercise books. They want to buy two dolls   for Gina. But all the dolls are too dear .
